chemoreception.notes: Nematodes in general rely heavily on chemoreception for locating hosts and navigating their environment. This is inferred for Trichinellidae.

mechanoreception.notes: Nematodes are known to have mechanoreceptors for sensing touch and movement. Inferred for Trichinellidae.

vision.notes: Vision is rare in nematodes, particularly parasitic nematodes like Trichinella. Likely absent.
